title: Tell us why your appeal is late
yourAppealIsOverOneYearLate: Your appeal is over one year late. That usually means you can’t appeal.
appealMayGoAheadForGoodReason: Your appeal may still be able to go ahead but only if there’s a good reason for it being late. Your reason will be reviewed before your appeal is accepted.
noGoodReasonWhyLate: I don’t have a good reason why my appeal is late

error.required: Please tell us why your appeal is late
